Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Temporin-1DRa (XXA; Leu-rich; UCLL1c; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Chemical modification:  C-terminal amidation.Activity: Active against E. coli (MIC 20 uM), S. aureus (MIC 5 uM) and  C. albicans (MIC 40 uM), P. acnes (MIC 30 uM) (Wu et al., 2020).Toxicity: Moderate hemolytic HC50 70 uM.  Sequence verified by Biswajit Mishra 2/2012. Updated 5/2020; 7/2021; 4/2023
Literature Information.Author: Conlon JM, Al-Ghafari N, Coquet L, Leprince J, Jouenne T, Vaudry H, Davidson C.2006
Literature Information.Title: Evidence from peptidomic analysis of skin secretions that the red-legged frogs, Rana aurora draytonii and Rana aurora aurora, are distinct species.
